casebody.data:
No. 10-6059. Lakenya T. Riley, Petitioner v. Union Parish School Board, et al. 562 U.S. 1000, 131 S. Ct. 552,

178 L. Ed. 2d 367,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8521, November 1, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis *368denied. Petitioner is allowed until November 22, 2010, within which to pay the docketing fees required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
